name: Simple Classic Solitaire
description:
If you like solitaire games, you're going to love this app!

The classic solitaire game plus the ability to control card movements naturally by just swiping or tapping the cards on your iPhone/iPod touch/iPad.

Think you have the best solitaire score around? You can check the Game Center leaderboard to see how your solitaire skills stack up against players all around the world!

* Unlimited hints
* Unlimited undo
* Klondike
* Custom backgrounds
* Auto complete
* Statistics
* Synchronize game center data
You can synchronize game data between different devices.

New Feature : Card Picker
Usage :
(1) 'Card Picker' can be called out when there are no effective moves.
(2) Use 'Card Picker' to draw a face-down card from desk to pile.
(3) Only one card can be picked out in one game. So you can use 'Undo' to get back the 'Card Picker'.
(4) You can switch off the feature in 'Options' if you do not like to use it.
